channel.title: WFurniture v0.1.0 WThives
channel.description:
There a Bug the WFurniture wont let it view the cost, can only see the word "cost" so if i want to add Ramp or something can only see "cost" but not the Icon of what anything cost like Cable or Wire or Iron Plate / Rod etc etc
When i click Remove for WFurniture can now view any cost like Iron plate ***/*** Wire ***/*** the star * is how many needed etc

item.title: WFurniture v0.1.0 WThives
item.dc:creator: @SatisfactoryBug Satisfactory Bug
item.description:
@SatisfactoryBug wrote:

There a Bug the WFurniture wont let it view the cost, can only see the word “cost” so if i want to add Ramp or something can only see “cost” but not the Icon of what anything cost like Cable or Wire or Iron Plate / Rod etc etc

When i click Remove for WFurniture can now view any cost like Iron plate / Wire / the star * is how many needed etc
